tasks.task_description: Check current directory and project structure

description: Install TonnyTray system tray application with Tauri and React frontend
context: Project structure confirmed - Tauri v2 app with React frontend, Node.js dependencies already installed (node_modules exists), package.json shows all required scripts
Node.js dependencies are up to date, 2 moderate vulnerabilities found but not blocking
Successfully built and installed TonnyTray .deb package. Build warnings about deprecated config fields and bundle type, but installation completed successfully
TonnyTray launched but has audio system issues - ALSA/JACK errors and XCB connection problems. App is trying to access audio devices but encountering permission/configuration issues
